Title: AeroTrax
Description:
With the release of Microsoft's latest operating system, Vista, applications interfaces may take a completely new approach leveraging the famed DirectX platform through the use of Windows Presentation Foundation. 

AeroTrax is a simple MP3 player using the new Aero Glass technology over the entire form using the new interface approach mentioned. 


*.NET v3.5 & Windows Vista Required

Gregory Kornblum - Tensai Labs
